questions.question: Australia has won the Cricket World Cup 5 times.
Only 8 different teams have ever won the Cricket World Cup.
Bangladesh has never reached a World Cup semi-final.
Zimbabwe has participated in every World Cup since 1983.
Kenya reached the semi-finals of the 2003 World Cup.
Netherlands has never won a match in World Cup cricket.
South Africa has never won the Cricket World Cup.
Afghanistan made their World Cup debut in 2015.
All founding members of the ICC have won the World Cup at least once.
Ireland has qualified for more than 3 World Cups.
